com.alicecallsbob.fcsdk.android.aed

Interface AED


  • public interface AED
    Allows data sharing between users by creation of topics to which data can be added.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Topic createTopic(java.lang.String topicName, int expiryTime, TopicListener listener)
      Creates and connects to a topic with the given expiry time.
      Topic createTopic(java.lang.String topicName, TopicListener listener)
      Creates and connects to a topic.

    • Method Detail

      • createTopic

        Topic createTopic(java.lang.String topicName,
                  TopicListener listener)
        Creates and connects to a topic. A user will then be able to add, remove data, receive updates and send messages to the topic.
        Parameters:
        topicName - The name of the topic, which is also its unique identifier.
        listener - The topic listener.
        Returns:
        the topic.

      • createTopic

        Topic createTopic(java.lang.String topicName,
                  int expiryTime,
                  TopicListener listener)
        Creates and connects to a topic with the given expiry time. A user will then be able to add, remove data, receive updates and send messages to the topic.
        Parameters:
        topicName - The name of the topic, which is also its unique identifier.
        expiryTime - The expiry time in minutes.
        listener - The topic listener.
        Returns:
        the topic.
